webProjects.title: U-CAN Academy Registration System
webProjects.description: Backend system for managing student registrations and admin dashboards.
webProjects.overview: A Node.js + Express backend built to track registered users, with MongoDB integration and deployment on Vercel.
webProjects.testimonial: Helped automate and streamline the registration process for thousands of students.

webProjects.title: Rebel Rover Travel Website
webProjects.description: A travel booking platform using a step-based UI and mock API integration.
webProjects.overview: A React-based responsive travel site where users can view and book destinations, integrated with a custom ticket generator.
webProjects.testimonial: The ticket generation and QR code feature really elevated the booking experience.

webProjects.title: YouTube Video Downloader App
webProjects.description: Web-based video downloader built with Django and React.
webProjects.overview: A full-stack application allowing users to input YouTube URLs and download videos in various formats and qualities.
webProjects.testimonial: One of the smoothest and cleanest download tools Iâ€™ve ever used.

webProjects.title: Super Agent - AI CSV Analyzer
webProjects.description: A smart AI tool for analyzing CSV data, generating graphs and downloadable PDF reports.
webProjects.overview: Built with React and Flask, this app visualizes data and writes professional PDF summaries from uploaded CSVs.
webProjects.testimonial: Exactly what we needed for fast insights on raw CSV files.
